reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's colors, fit, and style, noting it looks cute and has a mid-weight feel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great colors
items.body: The quality is good. The color accuracy is spot on and the sizing makes a compfy fit. Not to baggy and not to tight. I would not wear this though without a some type undershirt or slip shirt. Read more
items.author: Ducky

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice addition
items.body: Pretty, mid-weight, a bit short-waisted on me 5’8” just at top of hips. Read more
items.author: Saleem Seyal

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Missing colors, lots more yellow and no greens or blues
items.body: Colors were not as pictured. No green and lots more yellow. Very soft sweater, but I want the one actually pictured in the photo. This one reminds me of McDonald's. Read more
items.author: RW

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater for everyday wear.
items.body: This sweater is the perfect weight for layering and it fits really well. I’ve worn it at least a couple of times a week since I bought it. It does pill, of course, but not as bad as similar sweaters I’ve worn. It looks cute on, too. I ordered a size up because I wanted it to be loose enough to wear over a couple of layers, but I definitely could have bought my normal size. I like the looser fit, though. Read more
items.author: biolophile

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: Loved the colors but the quality was lacking. I am 5'7" and weigh 147. I ordered the XL and it was snug. The length was also shorter than it appears in the picture. I returned the item. Read more
items.author: Cheryl A Rankin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The fit is perfect…if you like a colorful sweater that will go with anything, this is it!
items.body: Love this colorful sweater…the fit is perfect…warm and have gotten compliments when I wear it Read more
items.author: Janet Loew

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not long enough
items.body: Eeeww kinda nice if longer covers stomach. Nice weaving but not a keeper. Read more
items.author: Vickie Traynham

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great color and fit
items.body: I love the fit of this sweater but that said I ordered an XL where I often wear a large in standard shirts. I ordered an XL because I wanted to ensure I had room to wear an undershirt for warmth but also in case I found the yarn itchy at all. I am glad I ordered the XL though because i am certain the L would have been too small. The XL is a great fit that allows for a thin shirt underneath but offers a very stylish fit. The colors are pretty in bright, I love it. It's very colorful but doesn't present itself as a rainbow print. I dig it and really appreciate that the neckline and ends are tipped with a solid color. It presents a matching opportunity but also helps to call out a single color. Now about the yarn ... I think with a couple more washes it will soften up a bit more. It's loose and easy to wear but its not the softest. I am get a smidge of itch. That said I am wildly sensitive to it so others might not experience it the as I do. But I am glad I can wear a thin shirt underneath for now. I will get a lot wears out of this and enjoy it though the winter and spring. The color and fit will make it an easy choice on cold mornings Read more
items.author: RMD

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gray, Multicolor2, Multicolor1, Green, Grey2, Grey1. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
